messages.title: Here's what's new in Shots Studio 1.9.12! üöÄ
messages.message:
Say Hello to 'Expressive' Shots Studio! üéâ

This release brings a fresh design, new features, and important improvements:

 - M3 Expressive design rollout.
 - Updated privacy dialogue for better transparency.
 - Added donation and source code links with GitLab fallback.
 - Polish localisation support onboarded.
 - Changed app font to Inter for a cleaner look.

Check out the changelogs for the full details!

With Love ‚ù§Ô∏è,
Team Shots Studio
